title: Bucs blanked by Saints, Browns fighting to play, Non-Division leading threats, Nate Burleson, and MNF Preview!
itunes:title: Bucs blanked by Saints, Browns fighting to play, Non-Division leading threats, Nate Burleson, and MNF Preview!
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast...hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager, and Super Bowl Champion Shaun O'Hara dive into the week with the Buccaneers being shut out by the Saints. The Browns have continued to overcome obstacles as they prepare to host the Raiders tonight on MNF. We look at the Non-Division leading teams that playoff contenders do NOT want to face. Nate Burleson drops by for Espresso Shots and Game Balls for NFL Week 15. Plus, the crew has a preview of the 2nd MNF matchup of the night between the Vikings and the Bears.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
